description: soft-bound book with light blue cover; white label with black text on cover; decorative page with block of text surrounded by jumping fish on waves near front of book; text with images including men on horseback viewing a rock (?), women on a veranda looking at a landscape, people on a large and elaborate boat, panoramic landscape views with labels, people dining, soldiers in mock battles, two boats with swimmers
marks: on first page, in black: inscription
title: The Illustrated Famous Places in Settsu (Settsu Meisho Zue), Volume 1, Sumiyoshi Country
